into consideration.  Attached patched file and diffs file for completeness.

Thanx for the answer. However, the solution did not change the name of the log
file ... the date was still appended to the filename. Also, the check if the
date has change is not necessary if the autoRollOver flag is set. The file that
follows accounts for that.
